name: Toggle Box
author: phantom.omaga

sections.description:
This is an awesome plugin that adds toggle box shortcodes and allows you to inset toggle boxes with that short code that is

‘[toggle Title=”your title here”]your text here[/toggle]’

Or you can se the toggle button in wordpress post editor.

I am working on to improve the plugin further more and will be adding different types of toggle boxes and wordpress option page.

Usage

use the following short code ‘[toggle Title”title of the toggle box”]text to be toggled[/toggle]

Or you can se the toggle button in wordpress post editor.
sections.installation:
Automatic Method

  1. Go to wp-admin->Plugins->Add New and search ‘toogle box’
  2. Click install and wordpress will automatically download and install the plugin
  3. activate it and all is done

Manual Method

  1. Upload toggle-box folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. activate it and all is done
sections.faq:
Do i have to edit my theme for this to work ?

No you don’t have to edit your theme.

Can style the toggle boxes my self ?

Yes go to the plugin folder open and edit toggl-box.css and add your styling there.

I have some more questions and suggestions. Where do i post them?

https://wordpress.org/tags/toggle-box?forum_id=10
